Samples - README
PDF Clown for .NET [../README.html]

Stefano Chizzolini <>

Project version: 0.1.0 -- README revision: 0 (2011-02-24)

---------------
Introduction
---------------
This section hosts samples that illustrate some of the functionalities provided by PDF Clown.


---------------
How to run the samples
---------------
These samples are console-based. To run the samples menu, type on your command line 'run.bat' (Windows) or 'run.sh' (Unix-like).


---------------
Resources
---------------
 * src [src/]: Source code
 * package [build/package/]: Executable (automatically generated)
 * api docs [./build/docs/api/index.html]: API reference (automatically generated)
 * build [build/]: Created by the build tasks and used to hold project-wide build items such as compiled source, assembled modules, and files generated by the doxygen tool. 
 * Navigation:
  * Current directory [.]: browse current section contents
